metadata.name: Ascension
metadata.description:
Introduction: My mantra is to capture Earth’s beauty with my lens and to display it to all humankind.

The Korea Point of View (K-POV) Collection – as the name implies – encompasses photographs that I have taken while living in the “Land of the Morning Calm”. I’m ecstatic to share different perspectives of Korea with my audience from my camera’s lens POV when I took each photo. I hope that my I audience enjoys the end results of my adventures in Korea as much as I do.  

What's the Story Behind the “Ascension” NFT?

“Ascension” is the POV that one gets when they ascend a staircase in the Dongdaemun Design Plaza (DDP) in Seoul, Korea.  
•	Artist: Seoul Man
•	Dimensions: 5464 x 8192
•	Location: Seoul, Korea
•	Year: 2022
